replies.msg:
"Dear free world,

A spectre is haunting Hong Kong - the spectre of the Communist China. Earlier this year, the Hong Kong government proposed a legislation that allows the extradition of alleged “fugitives” from Hong Kong to mainland China, where arbitrary detentions, unfair trials and death penalties are complacent. Despite the deafening outcry of a million on the street for two consecutive weeks, the government remained indifferent.

As the last bastion of Chinese freedom,
we resisted Beijing's systematic suppression on Hong Kong through paralysing the Beijing loyalists-controlled Legislative Council. Whilst the protesters were largely unarmed, the riot police responded with 150 canisters of tear gas, 20 shots of bean bag rounds and several rounds of rubber bullets. The unrest was characterised as a "riot" with dozens of protesters unreasonably arrested.

As the international community is losing its attention towards Hong Kong, the law enforcement authorities are expected to arrest protesters through a network of universities, hospitals and other institutions. But these actions will only happen after the Trump-Xi encounter in the G20 Summit. At such, we urge the Hong Kong government to:

1. withdraw the Fugitive Offenders (Amendment) Bill completely;

2. release all the political prisoners;

3. establish an independent committee for investigating police brutality;

4. prosecute the police who violated International Human Rights Standards for Law Enforcement;

China has been diminishing Hong Kong's guaranteed autonomy since the handover of power from Britain to China in 1997. This legislation is an explicit case in point. Your continuous effort to support Hong Kong's autonomy is a necessity for the world's established liberal order. The upcoming G20 Summit is our city's last roar to the world. This is our last fight before the illiberal order takes over the free world. Never let us walk alone.

With love & peace,
Hongkongers "

想問問中文公開信有無POST討論？

因為我見好多語病，想改，但GOOGLE DOC我怕一改太多有巴打以為我搞事
同埋中文信長得太過份喇，登左都唔會有人睇
